tables.name: projects
tables.fields: Name, Is_Tall, Is_Wide, Duration, Serial, Project_Type_ID, Priority_ID, Deleted, tasks, Cancelled, Show_Archived, Show_Deleted, Show_Deferred, Show_Done, Show_Cancelled

tables.name: tasks
tables.fields: Name, Project_ID, Duration, notes, Priority_ID, Task_Type_ID, DateTime_Created, DateTime_Start, DateTime_End, Task_ID,  Serial, Current, Archived, Deferred, Urgent, Doing, Done, Deleted, Cancelled

tables.name: sessions
tables.fields: Name, Task_ID, DateTime_Start, DateTime_End, Progress, Serial, Current, Deferred, Doing, Done

tables.name: persons
tables.fields: Name, Email, Mobile, Designation_ID, Image, Organization_ID
